sqlMap.name: class
sqlMap.sql:
insert into t_test_class (<#if class.id?exists && class.id!="">
 id 
</#if>,<#if class.class_num?exists && class.class_num!="">
 class_num 
</#if>,<#if class.class_name?exists && class.class_name!="">
 class_name 
</#if>,<#if class.create_time?exists && class.create_time!="">
 create_time 
</#if>) values (:<#if class.id?exists && class.id!="">
 id 
</#if>,:<#if class.class_num?exists && class.class_num!="">
 class_num 
</#if>,:<#if class.class_name?exists && class.class_name!="">
 class_name 
</#if>,:<#if class.create_time?exists && class.create_time!="">
 create_time 
</#if>)
